comments.content: It looks like **[Jellyka Estrya's Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405004020/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Jellyka%20-%20Estrya%27s%20Handwriting%20-%20Regular&fid=a63ab68c4020c6326556aed90df23a49&fsize=72&text=Delices&fit=1)** by Jellyka Nerevan [2008, Free for personal use]
